verses.text:
In the precious blood my Saviour shed He washed me white as snow.
With his own dear hand he washed me clean, He washed me white as snow.
What a fountain, sweet and pure I've! He washed me white as snow.
I will sing beyond death's chilling wave, 'He washed me white as snow.'

chorus.text:
O, my joyful song henceforth shall be, ''Tis the blood of Jesus
cleanses me,' Cleanseth, cleanseth, O, yes, it cleanseth me.
